Reviews.Title: The fit is loose
Reviews.Author: VideoProducer
Reviews.Content: I ordered these for a three camera security system that I installed. The BNC connection twisted on fine, but they weren't tight. You had to wiggle them to get the cameras to show up on the screens. I had to order different ones (without the wire) that fit tighter, to complete the install.

Reviews.Title: Excellent solution for security DVRs
Reviews.Author: James D. Blackburn
Reviews.Content: Used this in combination with DC baluns to wire security cameras back to DVR over cat 5 cable.  The longest run was ~160' and I had no issues with the signal quality.  The center pins are blunt on the end, with no radius or taper whatsoever, this can lead to the imperssion of a tight fit or not fitting at all.  the easiest way I found to insert them is to align the outer sleeve with the retainer posts, then push the connector inward via holding the boot and spinning back and forth slightly.  Once the connector is seated you can then spin the outter sleeve into the locked position.  Great price on these compared to other sources!

Reviews.Title: Mostly works
Reviews.Author: L. Decker
Reviews.Content: The balums are OK but had a problem with a couple.They were shorted. Have not had time to return defective items.

Reviews.Title: good product
Reviews.Author: Mike Sanchez
Reviews.Content: It made for a easy hook-up. Was able to run Cat5 wire through the walls to extend the camera cables

ProductInfo.Name: (12) Pieces of 1 Channel Passive CCTV Camera BNC Video Balun Transceiver for Security Camera System - BNC to UTP CAT5 2000ft transmission. Saves 20% on wire.
